languages.text: "Проклятый предатель! Придет время — и ты прольешь свою кровь за смерть Ее Светлости Теодоры! Запомни мои слова, ибо это клятва идущего на смерть!"
"Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"
languages.original_text: "Проклятый предатель! Придет время — и ты прольешь свою кровь за смерть Ее Светлости Теодоры! Запомни мои слова, ибо это клятва идущего на смерть!"

traits.locale_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"
"Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"
"Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"
"Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"
"Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"

languages.text: “该死的叛徒！总有一天，你要为谋杀西奥多拉夫人付出代价！别忘了我的话，因为这些话是直面死亡之人发下的重誓！”
languages.original_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"

traits.locale_text: “该死的叛徒！总有一天，你要为谋杀西奥多拉夫人付出代价！别忘了我的话，因为这些话是直面死亡之人发下的重誓！”

languages.text: «¡Maldit{mf|o|a} traidor{mf||a}! ¡Llegará tu momento de sangrar por el asesinato de lady Theodora! ¡Recuerda mis palabras, pues son el juramento de un hombre muerto!».
languages.original_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Maldit{mf|o|a} traidor{mf||a}! ¡Llegará tu momento de sangrar por el asesinato de lady Theodora! ¡Recuerda mis palabras, pues son el juramento de un hombre muerto!».

languages.text: 「呪われた裏切り者め！シオドーラ様殺害の罪で血を流す時が来るのだ！今私が言ったことを決して忘れるな。これは死に向かって進む者の宣誓だからだ！」
languages.original_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"

traits.locale_text: 「呪われた裏切り者！レディ・テオドラ殺害の罪で血を流す時が来るだろう！今私が言ったことを決して忘れるな。死に向かって進む者の宣誓だからだ！」
「呪われた裏切り者め！シオドーラ様殺害の罪で血を流す時が来るのだ！今私が言ったことを決して忘れるな。これは死に向かって進む者の宣誓だからだ！」

languages.text: « Maudit traître ! Vous finirez par payer pour le meurtre de Sa Seigneurie Théodora ! Retenez bien ces mots, car ils sont un serment prononcé par celui qui marche vers la mort ! »
languages.original_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"

traits.locale_text: « Maudit traître ! Vous finirez par payer pour le meurtre de Sa Seigneurie Théodora ! Retenez bien ces mots, car ils sont un serment prononcé par celui qui marche vers la mort ! »

languages.text: "Verfluchter Verräter! Der Tag wird kommen, an dem Ihr für den Mord an Ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora bluten werdet! Denkt an meine Worte, denn sie sind der Schwur eines Mannes, der in seinen Tod marschiert!"
languages.original_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"

traits.locale_text: "Verfluchter Verräter! Der Tag wird kommen, an dem Ihr für den Mord an Ihrer Ladyschaft Theodora bluten werdet! Denkt an meine Worte, denn sie sind der Schwur eines Mannes, der in seinen Tod marschiert!"

languages.text: "Şerefsiz hain! Leydi Theodora Hazretleri'ni katletmenin bedelini kanınla ödeyeceğin gün gelecek! Sözlerimi yaz kenara! Zira bu sözler, ölümüne koşan birinin andıdır!"
languages.original_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"

traits.locale_text: "Şerefsiz hain! Leydi Hazretleri Theodora'yı katletmenin bedelini kanınla ödeyeceğin gün gelecek! Sözlerimi yaz kenara! Zira bu sözler ölümüne koşan birinin andıdır!"

languages.original_text: "Accursed traitor! A time will come when you will bleed for Her Ladyship Theodora's murder! Remember my words, for they are the vow of he who marches toward his death!"
